sources.title: Hollywood and Vine
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Hollywood and Vine (1945) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Wanda McKay, James Ellison, Franklin Pangborn
 Director: Alexis Thurn-Taxis

 A young girl arrives in Hollywood with stars in her eyes, but finds her dog has better chance of becoming a movie star than she does!

sources.title: Hollywood and Vine (1945) Comedy, Drama
sources.description:
A young girl arrives in Hollywood determined to become a star in the movies, but finds that attaining stardom is a lot more difficult than she counted on. 
 
Director: Alexis Thurn-Taxis
Writers: Edith Watkins , Charles Williams 
Stars: James Ellison, Wanda McKay, Franklin Pangborn
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Drama

metadata.Plot: A young girl arrives in Hollywood determined to become a star in the movies, but finds that attaining stardom is a lot more difficult than she counted on. However, she does become a star of sorts--as the owner of a dog who DOES become a movie star.
metadata.Writer: Edith Watkins, Charles Williams, Robert Wohlmuth
metadata.Actors: James Ellison, Wanda McKay, Franklin Pangborn
